quotes.quote: If you weren't there when I was pushing the squad, don't be there when I'm collecting the loot.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You do not get mats from breaking someone else's builds.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You can wrap yourself up with bandages but, you will never fully be healed.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Always act confident. Never let them know you're on 1 HP.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: No one spectates you at the start but, they do as you get closer to winning.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Some people land on highground. Others just have to build up to it.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: If you weren't in the storm with me then why would I want to be in the circle with you.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Never switch up on minis just because you have a big pot. Remember who got you to 50 shield.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: When the game ends everyone goes back to the lobby. Even the winner.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: We all jump from the same bus. We just take different routes to the final circle.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Not only your enemies can shoot down your sky base. Sometimes your teamates can too.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: The smaller the circle the better the people.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: How do you expect to get high ground if you don't take the time to farm.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: No matter how many potions you drink, you will always take damage from the storm.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Always box up when you're trying to heal because people will push when you're at your lowest.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: People see you win the game, but they don't see how many times you've lost.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Never get comfortable in the circle you are in because eventually it will change.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: No one wants to spectate you unless you're going to win the game.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: The more you try to build up, the more people will try to shoot you down.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Even if you're on 1 HP, you can still do maximum damage.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You can have a full friends list but still have an empty lobby.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: If the door is already opened, it has already been looted.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: its only when the map changes that people care about the old one.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Metal will take longer to build but it will always last longer in the end.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Just because you're in the storm doesn't mean the game is over.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: It's not just enemies that you have to worry about stealing your loot, sometimes it can be your own teamates.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You can stay in the storm healing for as long as you like, but at some point you're going to have to leave the storm and fight.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Some people get mats from a llama while others have to farm it.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Never forget the OG squad, they are the real ones.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Remember to thank the bus driver, they are the ones that got you there.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: How can you expect to find golden loot if you bushcamp all game.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Everyone starts out with different loot, it's about how you use it to try and win.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You might get out of the storm but, the damage has already been done.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: I was too focused on building up, I didn't realize who was shooting me down.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Appreciate every season. You will never know if its the last chapter.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Glider will help when you're at your highest and leave when you're at your lowest
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You can keep changing skins but, at the end of the day, you are still the same player.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Even the best players will sometimes get lost in the storm.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You will never take the high ground if you are afraid of the fall damage.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Become the player, not the spectator.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You can get knocked but, with the right teammates, you can get back up.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: The people with scars are always the toughest.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Just because you're on the high ground doesn't mean that you can't build up more.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Just because they have a good skin does not mean that they are a good player.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: Even with bad loot, you can still go for the win.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15

quotes.quote: You either die an OG or live long enough to see yourself become a sweat.
quotes.author: Nik Eh 15
